Leverage FastAPI's asynchronous nature to speed up training loop execution
Modularize and streamline code organization through the combination of FastAPI routes and Python classes
Integrate popular ML libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn into FastAPI applications
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide
Upcoming features in Python 3.12, such as improved type hints and pattern matching, can further enhance the efficiency of your ML training loops
